En su estilo no hay otro game tan bien pulido.

Do I really need to explain this? 

Game is super fun as both Killer and survivor. The game becomes extremely challenging as a killer when you are up against 4 players who know exactly what they are doing and working as a team together. Coop with your friends makes this game extremely enjoyable. 
also there's some famous killers in the game that are super spoopey.

I want to leave the game a recommend but the straw that finally broke the camels back is when they introduced a bug causing people to get an error after a match, some lost progress.  In my case I lost tons of progress like a years worth and a bug that prevents unlocked perks from the shrine to show up in bloodwebs and I can't re unlock them on the shrine, I've been trying to get them to help me for about at least half a year now... 

first time I got my ticket closed on me, second time I was asked in very broken english to send them a log, I sent them the log and have waited a month and have even sent them the log again just in case... no reply no we are working on it... later got an update that they are working on it and near december (stared in... May??? March??? don't even remember anymore) got another we are working on it and then closed the ticket again...

[h1]This game is terrible.[/h1]
The concept of the game is fantastic but the developers are so worthless and incompetent that every single decision they've made for the past 6 months has made the game worse and worse. This game, like many other games, is balanced by people that don't even play or understand it on a high level, which results in horrible balance problems.

This game is really predatory when it comes to your money. It's one of those games that makes you feel like a pauper after you actually buy it. You pay hard earned cash to buy this game, only to realize that you'll have to buy tons of DLCs to actually have access to vital content in the game. The meta is dominated by Laurie Strodes, Ghostface, Nancy Wheeler, Freddy Krueger, etc. These characters can only be acquired by paying real life money, you [b]cannot[/b] grind for them.

Several Killers are so weak that they are nearly unplayable (Clown, Trapper, etc) and have been in this sad state since release, with no effort to rework them or even modify them.

There are 158 perks in the game, yet you'll only see around 8 different Survivor perks and 8 different Killer perks in your matches simply because out of those 158 perks, around 142 are objectively useless and clearly designed by people who don't understand the game and have no business balancing it.

The only jumpscares you'll experience in this "horror game" are the abrupt and uncalled for changes the developers decide to implement out of the blue. Their latest mishap being the "breakable walls", a bizarre unnecessary new mechanic they are going out of their way to implement on every map, wasting time and resources, despite the community desperately asking for simple balance changes instead.

The game is awful no matter which role you decide to play. If you play survivor, your success or failure is determined by the teammates you get. You could be the best survivor player ever but if your teammates are drowning in their own drool you are destined to lose. On the other hand, if you get insane teammates, then you win no matter what you do. This makes playing survivor feel like a dice roll.
On the other hand, if you play Killer, you feel like a spectator. Your only input is making the right calls and using your character correctly. Whether you win or lose depends on the survivors and the map. If the survivors are good you lose, simple as that, because the game is balanced in their favor. If they are bad then you have a chance.

The maps in this game are horribly imbalanced, to the point where the outcome of the match can be roughly determined as soon as you see which map you are on. For example, if the map is "Lery's Memorial Institute" and the killer is The Hillbilly, the killer loses instantly, because his power is rendered useless. On the other hand if the Killer is Ghostface on the same exact map, the killer will have a huge advantage because of how easy stealth is in this map. Yet another dice roll.

Do I recommend buying this game after playing it for 640 hours? [b]NO.[/b] The game has a ton of potential, but anything short of these awful devs getting abducted by aliens and replaced by replicas that actually know how to balance a game is not going to be enough to salvage it. Every change we've seen push it farther and farther away from a good game. The only reason this game is not dead and forgotten is that it's the most polished representation of this awesome genre of asymmetrical horror games.

По началу всё идет хорошо, ты осваиваешься понимаешь как играть в эту игру и тебе начинает нравится, ты тратишь деньги на дополнения что бы поиграть с новыми навыками зовешь друзей купить эту игру и просто играешь. Но через какое то время ты понимаешь, что большое количество вещей в этой игре не работают. Со своего опыта расскажу: 1. Мне дали шести часовой бан в игре потому что игра вылетала с ошибкой 8 012, шесть раз, шесть раз игра в которой у меня всё было хорошо заканчивалась тем, что я просто вылетал на первый загрузочный экран с ошибкой 8 012, я понимаю, что вы скажете "Да у тебя просто интернет плохо работает" но на это я отвечу что в других онлайновых играх такое не происходило не разу. И это только вершина айсберга, не работающие перки, куча багов которые ломают игровой процесс и просто заставляют выключить игру. 
Подводя итог: Я не советую играть в эту игру если вы хотите играть серьёзно, если вас волнует цифра вашего ранга советую просто удалить игру и не совершать какие либо покупки связанные с этой игрой.

《黎明杀机》无疑是一款很适合多人一起玩的游戏，虽然看起来应该是个恐怖向的游戏，不过实际上并不会出现被吓到的情况（永一麦叔）。和小伙伴一起玩的时候，最大的对手就是队友XD。不过仍存在很多奇奇妙妙的bug，时常令人哭笑不得。总体上来看，《黎明杀机》是一款带有瑕疵的优质游戏，现在就带上朋（内）友（鬼）一起来玩吧。
Muito bom

I can only give a review from casual player's perspective as I am not a looping god or a godlike killer.
The game has an unique design with the 1v4 game style. It's also a really good game if you would like to play in group.
There are lots of possible builds which can give fun. However, there is always meta which stands way above other builds.
If you want to play casually it shouldn't matter to you, but if you want to achieve something then you have to polish your "looping" skills. You will also have to use at least some of meta perks to counter killers' meta perks.
There are problems with connection too - after the introduction of dedicated servers there were some issues - major and minor. And there are still some, but the creators are trying to improve the game.
I recommend buying it if you:
a) have a bunch of friends which are willing to play together with you
b) want to play a game where jumpscares are common for some killers
c) want to teabag someone and face the consequences of your actions.
